126 class MultiPhaseEquilSolver
127 {
128 public:
132  MultiPhaseEquilSolver(
133  const Thermodynamics& thermo, const bool pure_condensed = true);
134 
138  ~MultiPhaseEquilSolver();
139 
143  int nPhases() const {
144  return m_np;
145  }
146 
158  std::pair<int,int> equilibrate(
159  double T, double P, const double *const p_ev, double *const p_sv,
160  MoleFracDef mfd = GLOBAL);
161 
165  void addConstraint(const double *const p_A);
166 
170  void clearConstraints();
171 
176  void dNdT(double* const p_dxdt) const;
177 
182  void dXdP(double* const p_dxdp) const;
183 
189  void dNdg(const double* const p_dg, double* const p_dNdg) const;
190 
191  void dXdg(const double* const p_dg, double* const p_dXdg) const;
192 
193  void dXdc(int i, double* const p_dxdc);
194 
195  void dSoldg(const double* const p_dg, Eigen::VectorXd& dx) const;
196 
201  void elementPotentials(double* const p_lambda) const
202  {
203  for (int i = 0; i < m_solution.ncr(); ++i)
204  p_lambda[m_solution.cir()[i]] = m_solution.lambda()[i];
205  for (int i = m_solution.ncr(); i < m_nc; ++i)
206  p_lambda[m_solution.cir()[i]] = 0.0;
207  }
208 
212  void phaseMoles(double* const p_moles) const {
213  for (int m = 0; m < m_np; ++m)
214  p_moles[m] = 0.0;
215  for (int mr = 0; mr < m_solution.npr(); ++mr) {
216  int m = mp_phase[m_solution.sjr()[m_solution.sizes()[mr]]];
217  p_moles[m] = std::exp(m_solution.lnNbar()[mr]);
218  }
219  }
220 
221  /*
222  * Returns the current species moles vector as computed by the last
223  * call to equilibrate().
224  */
225  void speciesMoles(double* const p_moles) const
226  {
227  double temp;
228  for (int j = 0; j < m_solution.nsr(); ++j) {
229  temp = m_solution.y()[j];
230  p_moles[m_solution.sjr()[j]] = temp*temp;
231  }
232 
233  for (int j = m_solution.nsr(); j < m_ns; ++j)
234  p_moles[m_solution.sjr()[j]] = 0.0;
235  }
236 
240  int nSteps() const {
241  return m_niters;
242  }
243 
248  int nNewtons() const {
249  return m_nnewts;
250  }
251 
259  //void partialOfN(const double* const p_dg, double* const p_dN) const;
260 
261 
262 private:
263 
264  class Solution
265  {
266  public:
267 
271  Solution(const Thermodynamics& thermo)
272  : m_np(0), m_nc(0), m_ns(0), m_npr(0), m_ncr(0), m_nsr(0),
273  m_dsize(0), m_isize(0), mp_ddata(NULL), mp_idata(NULL),
274  m_thermo(thermo)
275  { }
276 
280  ~Solution()
281  {
282  if (mp_ddata != NULL) delete [] mp_ddata;
283  if (mp_idata != NULL) delete [] mp_idata;
284 
285  mp_g = NULL;
286  mp_y = NULL;
287  mp_lnNbar = NULL;
288  mp_lambda = NULL;
289 
290  mp_sizes = NULL;
291  mp_sjr = NULL;
292  mp_cir = NULL;
293  }
294 
295  int npr() const { return m_npr; }
296  int ncr() const { return m_ncr; }
297  int nsr() const { return m_nsr; }
298 
303  const int* const sjr() const { return mp_sjr; }
304 
309  const int* const cir() const { return mp_cir; }
310 
314  const int* const sizes() const { return mp_sizes; }
315 
319  const double* const y() const { return mp_y; }
320 
324  const double* const lnNbar() const { return mp_lnNbar; }
325 
329  const double* const g() const { return mp_g; }
330 
334  const double* const lambda() const { return mp_lambda; }
335 
339  //const ReducedMatrix reducedMatrix(const Numerics::RealMatrix& B) const {
340  // return ReducedMatrix(B, mp_sjr, mp_cir, m_nsr, m_ncr);
341  //}
342  Eigen::MatrixXd& reducedMatrix(
343  const Eigen::MatrixXd& B, Eigen::MatrixXd& Br) const
344  {
345  Br.resize(m_nsr, m_ncr);
346  for (int j = 0; j < m_nsr; ++j)
347  for (int i = 0; i < m_ncr; ++i)
348  Br(j,i) = B(mp_sjr[j], mp_cir[i]);
349  return Br;
350  }
351 
356  //const HMatrix hMatrix(const Numerics::RealMatrix& B) const {
357  // return HMatrix(B, mp_y, mp_sjr, mp_cir, m_nsr, m_ncr);
358  //}
359 
364  void initialize(int np, int nc, int ns);
365 
371  bool setupOrdering(int* species_group, bool* zero_constraint);
372 
377  template <typename E>
378  void update(
379  const Eigen::MatrixBase<E>& dx, const Eigen::MatrixXd& B)
380  {
381  for (int i = 0; i < m_ncr; ++i)
382  mp_lambda[i] += dx(i);
383  for (int m = 0; m < m_npr; ++m)
384  mp_lnNbar[m] = std::min(300.0, mp_lnNbar[m]+dx(m+m_ncr));
385 
386  updateY(B);
387  }
